summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Enhanced SocialFlow AI platform with subscription system, template editor, social accounts management, and post scheduling functionality
passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate - 20/20 tests passed)
User registration with 14-day free trial creation
Dashboard loads with complete navigation menu
Subscription page displays current Free Trial plan
All subscription plans displayed with correct pricing (Starter $29, Professional $79, Enterprise $199)
Templates page loads with Design Editor button

Template Editor toolbar with text, shapes, and image tools
Social Accounts page loads with platform connections (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, X/Twitter)
Post Creator page accessible with scheduling functionality
Plan-based feature restrictions system in place
AI integration endpoints working (caption and hashtag generation)
Landing page creation and public access
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (20/20 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (all core features working)
